name: ALPHAS: Survive the Swarm!
description:
Use Flamethrowers, Lasers, Shotguns and more across five deadly levels to end your hunt against the Sentinel Queen! - (PC Game: 1 - 2 Players)

BONUS CONTENT INCLUDED:

  • Source Code (C#) and scripts to see how the game was made.
  • 3D Models for the community to warp & modify.
  • Textures / Particle FX to use in your own projects.
  • Music and Sound Effects to enhance and remix.

Play-through Videos: YouTube

Developed in Microsoft XNA Studio by The A. Team:
-Adam Graham. Jonanne Kus, Brandon Bell, Greg Mladucky & Michael Williams.

Top-down Twin-stick Shoot'em Up Game inspired by Dead Ops Arcade from Black Ops. All 3D Models and Textures owned by 343 Industries & Microsoft.
